LanguageData.VPE.SpendPoints: Spend points on unlocking new paths, unlocking spells, unlocking meditation foci, improving stats, etc.
LanguageData.VPE.PsysetDesc: Drag and drop learnt spells into spellbooks that you can cycle between ingame.
LanguageData.VPE.DestroySkipdoor.Desc: Destroy this portal. It will no longer be usable, but will no longer impact the max magical capacity of {0}.
LanguageData.VPE.CancelSkipbarrierDesc: Click to cancel Projectile Portal on the caster.

{0}
Capturing Mages is a viable strategy and can be considered beneficial.
LanguageData.VPE.SellingEltexWarning: Selling Arcanium is against Imperial law. This may or may not affect your relations with the Empire in the future.
LanguageData.VPE.GiftingEltexWarning: Gifting Arcanium is against Imperial law. This may or may not affect your relations with the Empire in the future.
